    <facet>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM       http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:openlearn.open.ac.uk:DD305_2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>LearningSpace</catalog>
            <entry>DD305_2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en-gb">Who counts as a refugee?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wer gilt als ein Flüchtling?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Qui compte en tant que réfugié ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Quem conta como um refugee?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Chi conta come rifugiato?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ποιος μετρά ως πρόσφυγας;</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Quién cuenta como refugiado?</string>
          </title>
          <language>en-gb</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en-gb">The words ‘refugee’ and ‘asylum seeker’ have a wide variety of connotations in Britain, many of them negative. This unit explores how changing social policy and terminology help to shape, and are shaped by, the experiences of people seeking asylum in the UK.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Society</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">asylum_seeker</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Immigration</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">refugee</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>linear</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>2</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Wörter?refugee? und?Asyl Sucher? 
haben Sie eine breite Vielzahl der Konnotationen in 
Großbritannien, viele von ihnen negativ. Diese Maßeinheit 
erforscht, wie, Sozialpolitik- und Terminologiehilfe zur Form 
ändernd, und wird vorbei, die Erfahrungen des suchenden 
Asyls der Leute in Großbritannien geformt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le ?refugee de mots ? et chercheur de ?asylum ? 
ayez une grande variété des connotations en Grande-Bretagne, 
bon nombre d'entre elles négatives. Cette unité explore 
comment changeant l'aide sociale de politique et terminologique en 
forme, et est formée près, les expériences de l'asile recherchant 
de personnes au R-U.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O?refugee das palavras? e seeker do?asylum? 
tenha uma variedade larga dos connotations em Grâ Bretanha, 
muitos deles negativos. Esta unidade explora como mudando a 
ajuda social da política e da terminologia à forma, e é dada forma 
perto, as experiências do asylum procurando dos povos no Reino Unido.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il?refugee di parole? e cercatore di?asilo? 
abbia un'ampia varietà di connotazioni in Gran-Bretagna, molte 
di loro negative. Questa unità esplora come cambiando l'aiuto 
sociale di terminologia e di politica alla figura ed è modellata 
vicino, le esperienze nell'asilo di ricerca della gente nel 
Regno Unito.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το ?refugee λέξεων; και αναζητητής ?asylum; 
έχετε μια ευρεία ποικιλία των υποδηλώσεων στη Μεγάλη 
Βρετανία, πολλές από τους αρνητικούς. Αυτή η μονάδα 
εξερευνά πώς μεταβαλλόμενη τις οδηγίες κοινωνικής πολιτικής και 
ορολογίας που διαμορφώνουν, και διαμορφώνεται κοντά, η εμπειρία 
των ανθρώπων που επιδιώκουν το άσυλο στο UK.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿El?refugee de las palabras? ¿y buscador del?asylum?
tenga una variedad amplia de las connotaciones en Gran Bretaña,
muchas de ellas negativas. Esta unidad explora cómo cambia 
ayuda social de la política y de la terminología a la dimensión de 
una variable, y se forma cerca, las experiencias del asilo que busca 
de la gente en el Reino Unido.</string>
          </description>
